statement.p: Out of the last 48 days, it rained 12 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{12}}{{48}}={0.25}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.25}={25} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 25 .
